tool_description: This is the best Climate change news API
name: climatenews-api-3103
title: climatenews-api-3103

api_list.name: News from a Publication
api_list.description:
Give all news related to Climate change from a particular News company.
news/toi -> Times of India
news/bbc -> BBC
news/guardian -> The Guardian
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climatenews-api-3103.p.rapidapi.com/news/toi"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatenews-api-3103.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climatenews-api-3103.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climatenews-api-3103.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get all Climate change news
api_list.description: All the news related to Climate change will be shown.
